description: Data about external encounters linked to a Compass Rose episode.

columns.name: SUMMARY_BLOCK_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the episode record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REFERENCE
columns.description: The composite DXR reference ID for an external encounter linked to this episode.

columns.name: METRIC_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The status category ID for an external encounter linked to this episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive

columns.name: BND_EPSD_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source category ID for an external encounter linked to this episode.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


Visit Association


Auto Link


Auto Creation


Auto Link Via Transform


Auto Link Via Association


Auto Removal

columns.name: INVALIDATION_DATE
columns.description: The date when the link was found to be invalid for an external encounter linked to this episode.

columns.name: START_DTTM
columns.description: The encounter start date and time for an external encounter linked to this episode. This will only be populated for non-Epic encounters and is used to match an encounter to an existing link even when the reference ID changes.

columns.name: END_DTTM
columns.description: The encounter end date and time for an external encounter linked to this episode. This will only be populated for non-Epic encounters and is used to match an encounter to an existing link even when the reference ID changes.

columns.name: DISP_ENC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The encounter type category ID for an external encounter linked to this episode. This will only be populated for non-Epic encounters and is used to match an encounter to an existing link even when the reference ID changes.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Registration

columns.name: ENC_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The encounter type free text name for an external encounter linked to this episode. This will only be populated for non-Epic encounters and is used to match an encounter to an existing link even when the reference ID changes.

columns.name: ORG_ID
columns.description: A unique organization identifier that consists of the name and the organization ID for the source organization of an external encounter linked to this episode. This column is often used for grouping, sorting, and display purposes in reports.

columns.name: ORG_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.
